short_description_localized.en: Superior comfort and style from wall to wall with a flat-screen HDTV, and Bose sound system all wrapped around a regally sized king bed.
short_description_localized.es: Superior comfort and style from wall to wall with a flat-screen HDTV, and Bose sound system all wrapped around a regally sized king bed.

description_localized.en:
Our 208 guest rooms leave 208 different impressions on our guests each night. And that’s just how we like it. Our beyond chic in-room amenities empower anyone and everyone to find the ideal balance of work and play in their space with essentials like:
• Luxury Bedding
• In Room Safes
• Wi-Fi
• Plush pillow-top beds with allergen-free pillows and duvets
• Flat-screen HDTVs
• Skype and Bluetooth-enabled smart cordless phones
• Bose Wave Radio sound systems
• Luxury Bath Amenities
• Exquisite Terrycloth Bathrobes
